item.title: Contact
item.description:
If you have a document that needs to be translated or edited, I have the solution!

To receive a quotation, please email me at info@edbtranslations.com.

It will be my pleasure to answer your email in the next 24 hours.

item.title: Services
item.description:
English to French translation of various types of documents and also editing. The fields include (but are not limited to):

  • arts and culture
  • children and youth
  • cinema and television
  • environment
  • food and nutrition
  • general
  • governmental matters
  • hospitality and food service industry
  • human and social sciences
  • sports and leisure
  • tourism and travel
  • websites

item.title: about me
item.description:
My name is Emilie and I currently study translation at Université Laval. I will obtain my diploma in April 2017.

I have been passionate about words and reading since my early childhood. I read all the time!

I previously worked in a travel agency. I gained a lot of work experience in that field. I can work under pressure and respect tight deadlines and I am well-organized.

I am looking forward to working with you!

LinkedIn Profile
